title: Diverse visions: twelve Australian mid to late career artists
brief_description: Artists included are: Charles Blackman, Mike Brown, Ray Crooke, Rosalie Gascoigne, Inge King, Robert Klippel, Les Kossatz, Alun Leach-Jones, John Perceval, Gareth Sansom, Gordon Sheperdson, John Wolseley. Eight of the artists speak about their work on location at an exhibition. Catalogue essay writers speak about the work of the artists unable to appear. The documentary was devised by John Massy.
